email_destination.description: The list of people that get the emails notifications

busy_agent_fraction.description: Running/MaxRunning job fraction above which to consider an agent busy

idle_agent_fraction.description: Running/MaxRunning job fraction below which to consider an agent idling

site_out_of_overflow.description: The sites that should be taken out completely from the overflow mapping

site_for_overflow.description: The sites that we set to overflow and require a specific treatment

overflow_pressure.description: The ratio pending/running over which to consider overflowing

PU_overflow_overflow_reco.descrition: Whether or not to overflow the second step (reco) for workfow with PU_overflow enabled

warning_short_time.description: Time in minutes per core below which jobs are considered too short and a warning is issued.

warning_long_time.description: Time in minutes per core above which jobs are considered too long and have a chance at timing out.

warning_mem.description: Value in MB/core over which to consider a workflow from using/configured too much memory

tune_min_stats.description: The number of finished jobs required before making a performance estimate

mem_quanta.description: The quanta of memory in MB for the JobRouter

time_quanta.description: The quanta of time in min for the JobRouter

slope_quanta.description: The quanta of the slope of memory/core in MB for the JobRouter

read_quanta.description: The quanta of read requirements in kb/something for the JobRouter

htcondor_binning.description: The number of bins to use for quantizing values used for tuning job requirements

min_core_for_resize.description: The minimum of original core requested to allow resizing

DDM_buffer_level.description: The fraction of the DDM quota we are allowed to use

sites_banned.description: The sites that are banned from production

sites_auto_approve.description: The sites we can autoapprove tape request to

sites_space_override.description: Over-ride the available space at a phedex end point

sites_with_goodIO.description: The sites identified as having good storage badnwidth

blow_up_limits.description: Pair of Blow up factor for taskchain above which to act, and needed amount of cores to receive large such taskchain. Probably deprecated now with GQ taking this into account. Was (5,4000) before

GB_space_limit.description: The value in GB that we allow the output size to be before adapting the splitting

output_size_correction.description: The correction factor to be applied to SizePerEvent per keyword.

memory_correction.description: The memory setting to be set for task with that keyword in

max_cpuh_block.description: Value of CPUh above which a wf is blocked from assigning

block_repositionning.description: Whether or not to retransfer block from WQE without location

allowed_bypass.description: Who is allowed to bypass and force complete

max_tail_priority.description: Number of workflow to increase the priority of at a time

injection_delay_threshold.description: Number of days after wich to increase the priority of a workflow

delay_priority_increase.description: Priority from original increase per week over the delay threshold

injection_delay_priority.description: Priority above which we can increase the priority of a workflow after running too long

max_force_complete.description: Number of workflow that can be forced complete at a time

max_per_round.description: limitation on the number of wf to process per module

default_fraction_overdoing.description: Completion fraction above which a workflow will force complete

default_fraction_pass.description: completion fraction above which to announce dataset

cumulative_fraction_pass.description: Whether or not the pass threshold per campaign are counted as is, or cumulatively.

onhold_timeout.description: Number of days from completed after which a workflow onhold gets by-passed automatically.

damping_fraction_pass.description: Time in days (since completed) after which to start reducing the pass threshold.

damping_fraction_pass_rate.description: Time in days (since started running) after which to reduce the passing fration by 1%, every such time.

damping_fraction_pass_max.description: Value in % of the max damping of passing fraction

acdc_rank_for_truncate.description: Rank of the acdc after which we truncate at the pass threshold (-1 means any order, 0 means after first round,... )

pattern_fraction_pass.description: overide of the completion fraction of dataset with keyword

tiers_with_no_custodial.description: The data tiers that do not go to tape. Can be overidden by custodial overide at campaign level

use_parent_custodial.description: Use the location of the parent dataset for custodial copy

tape_size_limit.description: Size over which to prevent transfer to tape automatically

tiers_with_no_check.description: The data tiers that do not pass closeout checks. Can be overidden by custodial overide at campaign level

tiers_no_DDM.description: The data tiers that do not go to AnaOps

tiers_to_DDM.description: The data tiers that go to AnaOps

secondary_lock_timeout.description: The number of days to keep a secondary input locked

tiers_keep_on_disk.description: the data tier not unlocked until used again

check_fullcopy_to_announce.description: Whether to check for a full copy being present prior to announcing a dataset

stagor_sends_back.description: Whether the stagor module can send workflow back to considered

max_handled_workflows.description: The total number of workflows that we allow to handle at a time (transfer, running, assistance)

max_staging_workflows.description: The total number of workflows that we allow to stage at a time

max_staging_workflows_per_site.description: The total number of workflows that we allow to stage at a time per site

max_transfer_in_GB.description: The total size of the input datasets that can be transfered at a given time

transfer_timeout.description: Time in days after which to consider a transfer to be stuck

transfer_lowrate.description: Rate in GB/s under which to consider a transfer to be stuck, after transfer_timeout days

less_copies_than_requested.description: Decrease the number of requested copies by that number, floored to 1

chopping_threshold_in_GB.description: The threshold before choping an input dataset in chunk of that size for spreading to sites

retrieve_errors_timeout.description: Time in minute that we allow to get logs from where they are before shutting retrieval down.

full_report_top_N.description: The number of top N workflows with failures and cooloff to show.

expose_top_N.description: The number of top N error code to expose logs of.

n_error_exposed.description: The default number of job cmsrun logs to retrieve

expose_archive_code.description: The error codes that should get a cmsrun log exposed

expose_condor_code.description: The error codes that should get a condor lot exposed.

use_recoveror.description: Whethe automatic recovery can be tried.

8001.details: No lhe event found in ExternalLHEProducer::produce()

error_codes_to_recover.description: The error code, threshold and rules for auto-recovery

error_codes_to_block.description: The error code, threshold and rules to prevent auto-recovery

8021.message: Please take a look and come back to Ops.

error_codes_to_notify.description: The error code, threshold and rules to notify the user of an error in production

user_rereco.description: The users from which we expect ReReco requests

convert_to_stepchain.description: A list of keywords to match workflow names, and convert to StepChain if technical constraints are met

user_relval.description: The users from which we expect relval requests

user_storeresults.description: The users from which we expect StoreResults requests

relval_routing.description: Set of keywords and special settings for relvals

batch_goodness.description: Level below which to include a note in the batch report
